mapper.select: SELECT rowNum "num", da.countrycode "countryCode", da.countryname "countryName", da.tea "tea", da.beans "beans", da.nuts "nuts", da.coffee "coffee", da.cocoa "cocoa", da.hemp "hemp", da.cotton "cotton", da.otherGrains "otherGrains", da.vegetables "vegetables", da.potato "potato", da.rice "rice", da.sugar "sugar", da.wheat "wheat", da.tobacco "tobacco", da.corn "corn", da.oil "oil", da.palm "palm" FROM tb_ecc_agr_procon da
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_ecc_agr_procon ( countryCode, countryName, tea, beans, nuts, coffee, cocoa, hemp, cotton, otherGrains, vegetables, potato, rice, sugar, wheat, tobacco, corn, oil, palm ) values ( #{countryCode}, #{countryName}, #{tea}, #{beans}, #{nuts}, #{coffee}, #{cocoa}, #{hemp}, #{cotton}, #{otherGrains}, #{vegetables}, #{potato}, #{rice}, #{sugar}, #{wheat}, #{tobacco}, #{corn}, #{oil}, #{palm} )
